data.text: Have the best time ever here great manager and staff and life guard :)  we have only great things to say about our stay here the staff were great 100% wish I could have stayed longer the hotel is clean and food was lovely and coffee was amazing too!:)  I definitely can’t wait to get back soon hopefully! This is definitely the hotel to go to 100%
data.title: Amazing time in this hotel

data.text:
Front desk staff were very good & check in was done with out any delay. 
thanks to  Mr. Praveen for arranging 2 days stay at this hotel. We stayed in Standard king room.  Neat & spacious room.  King size comfy beds with lovely large pillows .  The room was noise free. Clean toilet with toilet accessories & Linen. Tea/ coffee making facility Amble parking area. Great breakfast. Friendly & courteous staff  
Well equipped & spacious gym, big pool, decent steam & sauna rooms are there , but we didn't use any of these due to pandemic situation.
data.title: Great location , Perfect place to stay

data.text:
Really cute apartment /rooms ..
We’ve been there for like 8 days -it’s clean and nice !
The receptionist both of them day shift /night shift were super friendly !they helped us soo much!thank you again for that great service we really appreciated that !the housekeeping was nice as well !!its a lil but far /but also u can save some money cause they have some really nice fares !
data.title: Surprised but like in a good way …

data.text:
Avoid at all costs.  We stayed at this hotel in April 2021 and had a decent stay, the place had newly opened and had a decent set of amenities.  Fast forward 6 months when we returned to Dubai we booked this hotel again. 

BIG MISTAKE - this hotel well and truly sits in my top 3 worse hotel experiences of my life.  I am not fussy when I stay in hotels and usually only use the rooms to sleep and have a bath/shower.  I am out most of the day, so my main concern is that the room is clean and comfortable. 

We checked in around 6AM due to a 3-4 hour flight delay and even in such a state realised the room did not appear as clean as it should.  Once we had the opportunity to assess the room we raised a formal complaint, which resulted in the hotel sending 2 cleaners and a 'manager' to assess our complaint. 

I pointed out everything that was left dirty and showed them cleaning wipes I had used on the table and other room areas to showcase how much dirty, dust and food particles had been left behind. He assured us that we could leave the room and he would ensure the room was thoroughly cleaned. 

We left the room for circa 10 hours and upon our return sadly over half the issues we had pointed out had not been cleaned. Just plain nasty but especially dangerous during covid.  So I have had to resort to cleaning and sanitising the room myself.  I left a note requesting them to review and clean the room properly today but apart from making our bed (which I had made already), they did no cleaning.  Nobody even stepped foot in the bathroom, let alone clean it. 

The room stinks of smoke, so I have had to turn on the air conditioning unit on full and leave the window wide open.  Which results in the constant noise of the busy traffic between Sharjah and Dubai.  

The windows are stained with bird poop and the curtains are caked in dust and dirt. The carpet is dirty, the wardrobe sliding doors are broken and the list goes on... 

For 2 nights now I have had to have a cold shower as there has been no hot water.  After making a second formal complaint about this today someone came to our room who advised us that we should leave the sink taps on when having a shower to ensure we get a lukewarm shower and that is the best it would do. 

The only pro is that is it very close to where my brother apartment so I have been able to go to his apartment for respite during the day. I am booked here until midday Friday and cannot wait to check out and move to a different hotel.
data.title: Avoid at all cost, rather stay in my car than here.

data.text: The hotel is very, very nice, and the service is really 5 stars, and the stay is wonderful and the last visit will not be, and I am  proud of the hotel and their wonderful design,  the team is very friendly and made me feel like I am really in my place, I enjoyed
data.title: Dubai
